channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street sign broken, 7th July
item.description:
Street sign broken

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pagets Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in pavement problem, 7th July
item.description:
Customer reports that a large vehicle has mounted the pavement at the location and left a wheel-shaped groove in the tarmac, around 75cm long and 7cm deep. They are concerned that it is a trip hazard for pedestrians.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 7th July
item.description:
2 HOUR WITH GIVE AND TAKE MAKE SAFE DAMAGED CABINET WITH X3 BARRIERS AND X6 SANDBAGS PLACE AROUND CABINET (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th July
item.description:
Customer reports that the tree at the location has been dead for 2 years. Branches are now starting to fall off and could potentially hit parked vehicles, resulting in a claim. Please can it be removed.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 7th July
item.description:
Road lane closure 28 day please lift and relay x1 sunken rocking drain cover and frame 700x700x40mm stats required unable to mark up due to car size is approximately (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 7th July
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure required 28 day footway abrupt level different 1000x600x20mm. Tarmac patch required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous children's behaviour., 7th July

item.title: Sinking road on farmfield road, 7th July
item.description:
Farmfield road near the junction with Salisbury avenue is sinking creating a dangerous situation for cyclists and motorists as there are vehicles parked on the other side and in rain there are puddles formed on the road making it difficult to know what kind of surface underneath the puddle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not working, 7th July
item.description:
Street lights in Heron Close, and in Hatherley Road (to the right and left of the Heron Close junction) have not worked since 18th June
